column1:
nicjmj,"2020-01-11T05:20:39.14Z","Unrealistic set full of fun !","

Hi everyone from France!
This buggy was likely to complete 3 sets I already got from 2019 fire series (60216, 60217 &
column2: 60231), so it was on my list for 2020 ! I was lucky to discover this set under Christmas Tree as an extra gift, which pleased me a lot as it contains a wonderful owl.

column1: The building is very simple, I did it without the instructions.
The buggy is simple and strong to support kid'
column3: to launch and to see what happen against a wall&#39
column4: . The shooter is cool and strongly fixed, even it doesn&#39
column5: t shoot that far and that precisely. I never saw such a vehicle in real life, so it is unrealistic, but fun to play. You can fill the energy raging out the motor and be immediately ready to go for a forest fire fight.

column1: Cool set, which I would recommand with no doubt for a young child. Afol will certainly adore the owl, so go on to help the awardable australian firemen !!!

column2: ve never been a fan of lego technic or bionicle, so the water cannon doesn&#39
column3: t fit here. This is a great addition for the younger who have to pass down the fire from the tree, but I decided on the non-filling water bullets: p And yes, the fire can be shot down because it is on a nice spherical base that beckons sideways. One accurate shot and the fire extinguished! This is not a city vehicle, but it takes fun in the forest to a completely different level.

column1: The fireman has a name because it is a set created based on the fairy tale Lego City Adventures, where Clemmons is one of the characters.
The set itself is quite poor in part in relation to the price. The vehicle is solid and well designed.

,TRUE,5,4,5,5,4 ARandomLegoFan","2020-11-11T16:21:54.437Z","A buggy as low as a gokart","

Part 1. The buggy:

This has to be the worst buggy Lego has ever made. The buggy has no detail and the wheels stick out a ton which makes it look like it was made for the 4 juniors theme. It is also incredibly low to the ground (just like cars in the 4 juniors theme) which makes it lose some play value. The buggy can hold on to a fire extinguisher which is a good thing for Clemmens because it'
column2: s the only effective way to put out the fire because the water cannon just can&#39

column1: The figure is definitely a cool one. He is named Clemmens. However, you shouldn'
column2: t get this set for Clemmens as he is in a Lego magazine which also comes with a quad which is far superior to this set and costs half the price.

column1: The owl is definitely a great thing to include in such a cheap set and has great printing. The bush (I think) is very simple and is supposed to catch on fire. Need I say more.
Cons: no detail on the builds, faulty water cannon, bush (I think) has next to no leaves, wheels that stick out and the buggy is very low to the ground.
